attributes.action: Enforce air-conditioning on public transport and airports during summer months
attributes.background: It gets very hot and sweaty on trains, buses and in airports during the summer months - and even during winter as the heating is cranked up!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. It's not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament to "enforce" air-conditioning on public transport.

You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. For example, you could start a petition calling for legislation to protect users of public transport from excessively high temperatures.
